committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fisheries and Wildlife Conservation and the Environment

official_title: An act to authorize appropriations through fiscal year 1986 for the Great Dismal Swamp, Minnesota Valley, and San Francisco Bay National Wildlife Refuges.

summary.text: (Measure passed Senate, amended) Increases and extends authorized appropriations until expended for the Great Dismal Swamp National Wildlife Refuge. Allots specified amounts for land acquisition for such refuge. Increases and extends authorized appropriations from FY 1983 until expended for the Minnesota Valley National Wildlife Refuge for land acquisition. Increases authorized appropriations for the development of the refuge-recreation area and makes such sums available until expended. (Currently authorized sums terminate on September 30, 1986). Extends the authorized appropriations for the San Francisco Bay National Wildlife Refuge from September 30, 1983 until expended.

titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations through fiscal year 1986 for the Great Dismal Swamp, Minnesota Valley, Sailors' Snug Harbor, and San Francisco Bay National Wildlife Refuges.
An act to authorize appropriations through fiscal year 1986 for the Great Dismal Swamp, Minnesota Valley, and San Francisco Bay National Wildlife Refuges.
